page.title: 15CLAYMORE - BROADFORD
page.content: {The Claymore Restaurant,Harapul}was re-opened in May 1985 after having been closed for ten years. It was decided to re-open as the restaurant is considered to be an asset to the village which,with an increasing tourist trade will provide an amenity hitherto absent. The restaurant can seat 60 people with 15 tables of 4 people.An average of 50 people a day eat at the Claymore. The Claymore opens at 11am and closes at 9.30pm. The restaurant has three kitchen staff and four waitresses. The owner is Mr.Nigel Macdiarmid of Kyleakin. A great deal of work was required to bring the restaurant back into serviceable condition and much of this was done by the owner himself.
